item.description:
Its been a cold blistery month, lets warm up on the dance floor to a good band and some down time at the tables.

If you want to avoid the small cover come before 7:30, and help me reserve some space tables and chairs.

Please put it in your RSVP if you want to eat, I plan to get there early wih you and will have a meet up sign posted on the table. Look forward to seeing you and will do my best at introductions prior to the music so come one and all and lets rock the night away ;-))

Dinner hour would be 7PM for those that can make it, if you are running late just buzz me at 978-857-6626 and I will do my best to hold you a seat.

 

Band: Last Kid Picked

Time: 9-9:30pm (band time for performance)

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Dinner Dancing Mix Mingle
